name: Google Plus One Bottom
author: ruo deng

sections.description:
Promotion your pr in google +1 with the google plus one bottom plugin. With google plus one bottom, your users can promote your content by sharing google +1.

This plugin now is only provide google +1 in single post page, the more will be later. With the google’s css, has some interface problems in the plugin admin interface, but it only in the admin interface.

RoadMap:

1:provide a shortcode to wordpress.
2:fix the css(now is use the google’s).
3:More custom in the front, weight, achive, and so on.
sections.installation:
1. Upload google-plus-one-bottom to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the setting plage
sections.changelog:
0.0.2

  • add the preview function for google +1 buttom’s style
